-1.title: Holiday Special
-1.plot: Lawd Have Mercy Holiday Special is a comical-clip show that our hosts Flex Alexander and Buddy Lewis take a comical look at the lighter side of the Holiday season through discussing some of the world's funniest clips pulled from the internet. This season we get a look at some of the most surprising gifts that parents prank their kids with, Santa fails, Brawling Santas, A unique rendition of the classic Christmas Hymn "Oh Holy Night" as well as the LHM Clip of the Season. Flex and the audience get a surpise vist from Swap meet Santa and his Flea Markey Elf, Elfante. ...

1.title: When Doves Cry
1.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy joke about Preachers with birds, endure bad church singers, breakdown the Clip of the Week, and the LHM Choir performs.

2.title: Cannonball for Christ
2.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy talk about some Baptisms gone wrong. The LHM Choir sings, and Flex breaks down the hilarious Clip of the Week.

3.title: Falling from Grace
3.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy have fun with low budget weddings, showcase some funny church signs, and jam with the LHM Choir.

4.title: 6 Feet Deep
4.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy find out that not all funerals are created equal. They break down the Clip of the Week, and Buddy shows us how to grieve.

5.title: On Fire for the Lord
5.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy breakdown bad church singers, have fun with church signs, and deal with a Mystery Clip that they've never seen before.

6.title: Lights Out
6.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy joke about various church fails, have fun with Mormons who can hoop, the LHM Choir performs, and the guys have to deal with a Church Hag, who don't take no mess.

7.title: Mmm ... Good
7.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy learn about the new "F-word," endure singers who should never perform in public, and get surprised by a Mystery Clip.

8.title: It's Not My Time
8.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy showcase kids puking at Christmas events, crazy church signs, and crazy preachers.

9.title: Slap the Devil Out of Me
9.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy talk about people losing their wigs, literally. They joke about dancing in church, LHM Choir sings, and we see a Deer in church.

10.title: Where's My Free Gift, Pastor
10.plot: This week on LHM, Flex and Buddy talk about people losing their wigs, literally. They joke about dancing in church, LHM Choir sings, and we see a Deer in church.

imdb.plot outline: There are many religions throughout the world. Lawd Have Mercy takes a funny look at religion and what happens when things don't go as planned. Each week our hosts Flex Alexander and Buddy Lewis will breakdown video clips downloaded from the internet or submitted by the public. Flex and Buddy will look at the these funny and rare moments at church, religious ceremonies and events (like weddings, funerals, Bar Mitzvahs, etc.) Whether it's a Pastor falling in the pulpit, a wedding proposal gone bad or a baby catching the holiest of ghosts, if it was caught on video we're going to share it and laugh about it. In Season 1 we will have visits from Pastor Buddy, the Church Hag and the LHM Choir. We will also have the recurring themes "Heavenly Voice", "OMG Moment", "Clip of the Week", "Dancing With the...", "Church Signs from Above", "Main Event" and "Pastor's Pulpit". You have never seen church like this.
imdb.title: Lawd Have Mercy
plot: There are many religions throughout the world. _Lawd Have Mercy_ (qv) takes a funny look at religion and what happens when things don't go as planned. Each week our hosts Flex Alexander and Buddy Lewis will breakdown video clips downloaded from the internet or submitted by the public. Flex and Buddy will look at the these funny and rare moments at church, religious ceremonies and events (like weddings, funerals, Bar Mitzvahs, etc.) Whether it's a Pastor falling in the pulpit, a wedding proposal gone bad or a baby catching the holiest of ghosts, if it was caught on video we're going to share it and laugh about it. In Season 1 we will have visits from Pastor Buddy, the Church Hag and the LHM Choir. We will also have the recurring themes "Heavenly Voice", "OMG Moment", "Clip of the Week", "Dancing With the...", "Church Signs from Above", "Main Event" and "Pastor's Pulpit". You have never seen church like this.
